33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"By the One in Whose Hand is my soul! The Hour will not be established until predators speak to people and until the tip of a man's whip and the straps on his sandal speak to him, and his thigh informs him of what occurred with his family after him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَلاَمِ السِّبَاعِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Predators Speaking
